description.translate: Everything that shines is not good, too many learn it at their expense.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Or maudit\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Tout ce qui brille n'est pas bon,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7trop l'apprennent à leurs dépens.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Everything that shines is not good,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7too many learn it at their expense.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HAS§a3 §7RES§c-1\"}"]}}
